comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: This is the southeast corner. There's a bank there today (BB&T, I believe), and the chimneys you see beyond the Shell station are those of First & Merchants National Bank, still in use as a Bank of America branch.

comment._content: Just under the shell sign and across the street are the Shops at 5700 Patterson which are still hopping! I have several of these older photos of the area, if anyone is interested.
